Human.name: Human
Human.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are known for their diversity and ambition.

traits.name: Adaptability
traits.description: Humans can adapt to almost any situation. Gain +1 to all saving throws.

traits.name: Quick Learner
traits.description: Humans gain 10% more experience from all sources.

Elf.name: Elf
Elf.description: Ancient and graceful, elves excel in magic and dexterity-based skills.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: Elves have heightened perception. Gain advantage on perception checks.

traits.name: Magic Affinity
traits.description: Elves have a natural connection to magic. Spell costs are reduced by 10%.

Dwarf.name: Dwarf
Dwarf.description: Stout and hardy, dwarves are known for their resilience and craftsmanship.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: Dwarves resist poison and have additional health regeneration.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: Dwarves have expertise with stone and metalwork. Advantage on related checks.

Orc.name: Orc
Orc.description: Powerful and fierce, orcs excel in physical combat and intimidation.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: Orcs can push through grievous wounds. Once per day, drop to 1 HP instead of 0.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
traits.description: Orcs deal additional damage on critical hits.

Halfling.name: Halfling
Halfling.description: Small but nimble, halflings are lucky and naturally stealthy.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.description: Halflings can reroll critical failures once per day.

traits.name: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: Halflings gain advantage on stealth checks.

Mycora.name: Mycora
Mycora.description: Fungal humanoids from the Verdant plane, Mycora share a communal consciousness and can adapt their bodies to various environments.

traits.name: Spore Symbiosis
traits.description: Mycora can release healing spores to regenerate health for themselves and nearby allies once per day.

traits.name: Environmental Adaptation
traits.description: Mycora can adapt to toxic environments and gain resistance to poison and disease.

Prismal.name: Prismal
Prismal.description: Crystalline beings from the Crystalline plane with geometric bodies that refract magical energies through their crystalline forms.

traits.name: Crystal Resonance
traits.description: Prismals can focus magical energies, reducing mana costs of spells by 15%.

traits.name: Geometric Insight
traits.description: Prismals gain advantage on checks involving mathematics, precision, and magical formulas.

Cinderspawn.name: Cinderspawn
Cinderspawn.description: Ash-infused beings from the Ashen plane whose bodies constantly regenerate from inner embers, leaving trails of fine ash behind them.

traits.name: Ember Renewal
traits.description: Cinderspawn regenerate health when near fire and gain resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Ash Walking
traits.description: Cinderspawn can temporarily transfer their consciousness to ashes, allowing limited espionage and communication.

Maelstri.name: Maelstri
Maelstri.description: Storm-touched beings from the Tempest plane with partially translucent bodies that contain swirling internal tempests.

traits.name: Storm Binding
traits.description: Maelstri can capture essence of storms in their bodies, granting unpredictable magical abilities once per day.

traits.name: Electric Reflexes
traits.description: Maelstri have lightning-fast reactions, gaining advantage on initiative rolls and dexterity saving throws.
